text:
[Verse]
Woke up to the sound
Raindrops falling down
But I see the glow
Through my window

[Verse 2]
Clouds upon the sky
But my heart feels light
Dancing in my room
To a happy tune

[Chorus]
Sunshine in the rain
We can feel the same
Shine on through the gray
Make the dark go away

[Verse 3]
Steps in puddles bright
Colors shining right
Umbrellas all around
But we don’t feel down

[Bridge]
Hold my hand real tight
We’ll make it alright
Rainbows overhead
Chasing blues that fled

[Chorus]
Sunshine in the rain
We can feel the same
Shine on through the gray
Make the dark go away
title: Sunshine in the Rain
